tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been treated by Sunny Sir since 3 months. He gives ample time for every patient he treats. He is very friendly and polite.  
He has good knowledge of medicines and his prescription are very effective.

Sunny Sehgal treat his patients in a very patient manner and help them recover way quicker than expected. Recently I was diagnosed with Sepsis and I visited his clinic. During the treatment, he made sure that I stay positive and get speedy recovery. And due to his empathetic behavior and excellent experience I got recovered real quick. Thank you for your advice and helpful treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited the Dr. Sunny Sehgal many times.. mostly for the general consultantation and typhoid. He is knowledgeable person with several years of experience. He listens to his patients problem with full patience. And gives ample amount of time.
Recently my mother got covid+ and we consulted him and due to his treatment my mother got healthy again (covid -).
Till now my experience is very good .I will give him 5/5. üëç And I will recommend that you must visit him. **** ****** ** ***********

review: ****** ***** ****** ** *** **** ********* ************* ****** * **** **** **** he understands the problem and provides us the best solution according to the the age and the problem that we are going through I would recommend this doctor to each and everyone if you want a perfect solution for your problem is just not a doctor but he treats his or her patient as an elder brother understanding the problem and the consequences the patient is going through I am completely satisfied with the the solution and the medicines that he has given me which has helped me  in rectifying my problem and feeling me motivated and healthy.

review: I have visited this doctor for my chest pain. He did **** ***** checkup and then got my ECG done in which he claimed that i may have heart issue and may had a minor heart attack in past and he immediately gave me Sorbitrate also and got my blood samples as well.  I got so worried as i am only 27yrs old and hearing about  these heart issues had me traumatised. * **** **** *** ****** ****** **** ******** ************ *** *** ***** ***** ** *** *** ***** *** *** ******** ********* *** ***  ** ********* *** ******* **** *** ***** *** ******* ********* **** ****** ********* ********* **** ** ***** **** **** *** ****** ****. *** ***** ****** ** **** ***** ****** He charged 2400 ************* *** **** ** ****** *** *** ****. Definitely not recommended at all.

tags: Value for money,
review: Doctor's communication is very good, he also discuss the issue very well and give full time, but only negative thing is His staff force to purchase medicine from their clinic only, staff also warns that some medicines do not available in any chemist ant it will be available only their clinic only, and they are correct for example a medicine name "Rforte" which contain multivitamins and omega 3 cost MRP Rs. 650 manufacturing in Laxmi nagar, not available anywhere neither online nor at any chemist *** * ***** **** *********** ** *** *** ** ***** ***** ** I purchased one and then could find combination. you will not also find such name in any online site also, * **** **** **** **** ** ********* *** ****** ****** ********** **** ******** ***** ************* ******* ** ***** *** ***** *** ** ****** ********* ** *** **** ** *******
reply_text:
Greetings,

We regret for the inconvenience caused. 

As per clinic records you visited us on 20th February'22.

We don't support such activities like pushing patients to purchase medicine from in house dispensary (as that's third party and opened for emergency purpose only) nor we promote lab or diagnostic centre for tests or investigations.

In case any clinic staff involved in this , kindly put his/her name in written complaint to Director of centre, for proper action against it.

Secondly, the medicine named 'R-forte' contains coenzyme Q10 , methylcobalamin mainly  which is available in many reputed pharmacies in Delhi including in Laxmi Nagar only. Someone gave you wrong information that it's manufacture in laxmi nagar, as no medicine manufactures in laxmi nagar. As no manufacturing plant can't be here.

In case if you find difficulty in buying any prescribed medication or any cost burden, you should contact treating doctor , so that, he can able to advised you the same alternative that suited best for you. 
( Instead of putting blame game on your treating doctor after a month time )

As many pharmacists gives alternative without  having proper information of composition.

Hope you are doing well and look forward to redressal your complaints. 

Regards,

Director, PHC

review: I really recommend Dr. Sunny Sehgal for everybody because he is well educated & well talented, *** **** ********* *** ****** **** *********** In my case, I have got nerve injury in my hand & he has treated it very well. He is humble, polite, professional & moral towards his duties by charging very genuinely to the patients. He gives you proper time in listening for your treatment as well as also active in charitable consultations. So, go ahead. üåü üåü üåüüåüüåü 5 star Rating for the Doctor.
reply_text:
Greetings,

Hope you are doing fine! 

Thanks for your positive words. It gives me and my team immense strength in this panicdemic situation to serve in better way.

Wish you and your family be safe and healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Sunny for Typhiod. I had a fever of 103 and was struggling with the medication. Dr Sunny absorbed the reports and heard the issues patiently. He gave the background potential reasons, the medication and precautions what to take care off. I made speedy recovery and have been really satisfied with his consultation. I would recommend Dr Sunny to everyone. Thank you for your guidance

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Sunny Sehgal is very friendly and intelligence Dr. He have explanation very well about health problems. Suddenly my fever have go up to 103 F and i gone to nearest hospital Garg Hospital but unable to control the fever. After that i have searched online Dr Sunny Sehgal and after consultants I have control the fever and parallels blood test also recommended for Typhise Test. He have recommended Antibiotics Ziffi CV 200 tab and other medicine also for improve the LFT parameters. His recommended medicine save the my life. So i strongly recommend for other patients for visit the Dr Sunny Sehgal for consulting any health issue problem. He have always reply my message when required & information any things. Thanks very much for Dr Sunny Sehgal

context: Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review:
My granny was suffering from chest pain since more than 18 years and she did not see any doctor. When i came to know about her condition then I consulted for her(telephonic) And at first consultation dr sunny sir told about causes after observing the case.. And she got much relief as she started medicines...
There are  some  tests for diagnosis which are to be done further ...
Overall sunny sir is a really good doc... As he is friendly, kind and his diagnosis is quite good... Would highly recommend.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i visited with my mother in law for stomach issue. doctor suggested for some test which he wrote on short language. except his clinic you can't be able to do test from outside.. all recommend medicine are only available in his clinic. so much harassment I faced. with out any clarification they admitted mother in law in short time bed service for 1 hour. and charged 1500. ** ** *** ***** * ***** before leaving I already paid them Rs. 1500 and showed the screenshot to his employee. and his employee confirmed that payment done. after confirmation from employee I left the clinic. but from next day continuously his employee calling me that payment not credited to his account. and using me  slang languages. I am visiting the doctor from last 2 months. always I ignored such thing, never I wrote anything. but now it cross my patience level. highly recommend don't visit the doctor.
reply_text:
Greetings, 

Regret for inconvenience caused.

Kindly share prescription letter of your visit, transaction ID of Rs 1500 payment of that day and  further payments if you made.

We will rectify the issue and take the appropriate action under Delhi jurisdiction.

Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sunny is a very ***** ethical, and compassionate doctor. We highly recommend him.
My mother was suffering from covid complications and was critical at that time. We didn't get a hospital bed and he helped us treat her at home. With his treatment, advice, and help we kept her stable for 8 days, till we got an ICU bed. He was available at all times for any advice needed or when my mother's health deteriorated. In a way, complete hospital-like treatment was set at home with his guidance - IV fluids and medicines. He even helped us get a bed and contacted many hospitals in this process. Finally, we got an ICU bed and could save her. 
Thanks, doctor for your help and support in those tough times.
